sendChallenge

public static boolean sendChallenge(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                    Challenge challenge)
                             throws IOException
Handle an HttpServletResponse which has failed authentication by sending a Challenge header

Parameters:
resp - the HTTP Response
challenge - the Server challenge parameters
Returns:
true if response was flushed successfully, false otherwise
Throws:
IOException - if anything went wrong
